mainEntity.name: How can I protect my business from cyber threats?

acceptedAnswer.text: Protecting your business from cyber threats requires a multi-layered approach including implementing strong security policies, using up-to-date security software, regular employee training, conducting vulnerability assessments, enabling multi-factor authentication, maintaining secure backups, and partnering with a managed security service provider like IT Rapid Support for 24/7 monitoring and protection.
